title: Which is regarded as a more difficult A level in the UK, Further Maths or Chemistry? - Quora

response.answer_text: I did Further Maths at A-level but not chemistry. I was told by my maths teacher that a B in Further maths is basically equivalent to an A in any other subject. Of course, all the sciences and maths are the most technically difficult and it is all dependent on your personal strengths on which one is harder or easier.
